positions.subtitle: TryCarriage.com
positions.description: â€¢ Planning daily routes, alternative delivery solutions and full supervision of the fleet.â€¢ Supervise the full order fulfillment.â€¢ Daily monitoring of Dashboard.â€¢ Assign drivers to routes and provide manifest of delivery journey.â€¢ Assist in preparing and monitoring work schedules.â€¢ Monitor operational policies and procedures to ensure the most efficient and effective processing of delivery orders, control damages, errors and mis-picks and excellence in customer service levels.â€¢ Handle and resolve customer complaints due for poor or bad orders.â€¢ Delivering products to customer in timely and professional manner.â€¢ Manage the collect cash by drivers before of shift.â€¢ Ensuring continuous improvement to maintain quality & service level standards through preparing daily KPI reports.â€¢ Performing root cause analysis & rectifying the errors immediately.â€¢ Liaise with customer service department to check problematic cases and bad order debits on restaurant, customer service, driver or Operations.â€¢ Weekly supervision of fleet owned by company and logging in sheets.â€¢ Providing Basic training to new drivers on process, procedures & customer service orientation.â€¢ Identify gaps, shortcoming or system limitations if any and coordinating with Senior manager regularly
positions.title: Operations Supervisor
positions.description_html:
â€¢ Planning daily routes, alternative delivery solutions and full supervision of the fleet.
â€¢ Supervise the full order fulfillment.
â€¢ Daily monitoring of Dashboard.
â€¢ Assign drivers to routes and provide manifest of delivery journey.
â€¢ Assist in preparing and monitoring work schedules.
â€¢ Monitor operational policies and procedures to ensure the most efficient and effective processing of delivery orders, control damages, errors and mis-picks and excellence in customer service levels.
â€¢ Handle and resolve customer complaints due for poor or bad orders.
â€¢ Delivering products to customer in timely and professional manner.
â€¢ Manage the collect cash by drivers before of shift.
â€¢ Ensuring continuous improvement to maintain quality & service level standards through preparing daily KPI reports.
â€¢ Performing root cause analysis & rectifying the errors immediately.
â€¢ Liaise with customer service department to check problematic cases and bad order debits on restaurant, customer service, driver or Operations.
â€¢ Weekly supervision of fleet owned by company and logging in sheets.
â€¢ Providing Basic training to new drivers on process, procedures & customer service orientation.
â€¢ Identify gaps, shortcoming or system limitations if any and coordinating with Senior manager regularly
